title: CycleRecord
description: Canonical schema for cycle records - strategic grouping of work

id.description: Unique identifier for the cycle (10 timestamp + 1 dash + 5 'cycle' + 1 dash + max 50 slug = 67 max)

title.description: Human-readable title for the cycle (e.g., 'Sprint 24', 'Auth v2.0', 'Q4 2025')

status.description: The lifecycle status of the cycle

taskIds.description: Optional array of Task IDs that belong to this cycle. Can be empty for cycles that only contain child cycles. (10 timestamp + 1 dash + 4 'task' + 1 dash + max 50 slug = 66 max)

childCycleIds.description: Optional array of Cycle IDs that are children of this cycle, allowing for hierarchies (e.g., Q1 containing Sprint 1, Sprint 2, Sprint 3). (10 timestamp + 1 dash + 5 'cycle' + 1 dash + max 50 slug = 67 max)

tags.description: Optional list of key:value tags for categorization (e.g., 'roadmap:q4', 'team:alpha', 'okr:growth').

notes.description: Optional description of the cycle's goals, objectives, and context

examples.title: Sprint 24 - API Performance
examples.notes: Objetivo: Reducir la latencia p95 de la API por debajo de 200ms y preparar infraestructura para Black Friday.

examples.title: Authentication System v2.0
examples.notes: Milestone mayor: Sistema completo de autenticación con OAuth2, 2FA, y gestión avanzada de sesiones. Crítico para lanzamiento Q4.

examples.title: Q4 2025 - Growth & Scale
examples.notes: Objetivo trimestral: Escalar a 1M usuarios activos. Incluye mejoras de performance, nuevo sistema de auth, y lanzamiento de app móvil.
